name: BlubBlub: Quest of the Blob
description: BlubBlub is too cute! Escape through a trial of deadly traps to save all the blub friends!
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1024x768 High Color+ DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible
